DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study collect safety efficacy data Focused Ultrasound treatment ( UCP procedure ) open angle glaucoma patient without previous glaucoma surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Glaucoma Treatment Using Focused Ultrasound Open Angle Glaucoma Patients
DOC.criteria: Open Angle Glaucoma patient ( Primary Open Angle Glaucoma ( POAG ) include Pigmentary Glaucoma ( PG ) PseudoExfoliative Glaucoma ( PXF ) ) Any patient without previous conventional glaucoma surgery failure ( trabeculectomy , Deep Sclerectomy , Ahmed valve , drainage device implantation , cyclo cryotherapy , Diode laser cyclodestruction ) Subjects IOP adequately control glaucoma medication , IOP ≥ 21 mm Hg < 30 mmHg No previous intraocular surgery laser treatment 90 day HIFU Day Age > 18 year < 90 year Patient able willing complete postoperative followup requirement Patient diagnose normal tension glaucoma Ocular retrobulbar tumor Ocular infection within 14 day prior HIFU procedure Ocular disease glaucoma may affect assessment visual acuity and/or IOP ( choroidal hemorrhage detachment , lens subluxation , thyroid ophthalmopathy , proliferative diabetic retinopathy , clinically significant macular edema… )
